short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to block specific URLs and keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SiteStopper is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused and productive by blocking distracting websites and content. With SiteStopper, you can easily manage a list of blocked URLs and keywords, allowing you to customize your browsing experience and maintain control over your online activities.
